<!--StartFragment-->

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><strong><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Times;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Times">摘要：</span></strong><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Times;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Times">文章介绍了一些比较小众的编程范型，也提到了一些小众的语言，作者希望借此让大家更多的了解一些不是主流的编程范型，进而改变对编程的看法和思考。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">每时每刻我都在琢磨一种编程语言所做的一些与众不同的事情，这改变了我对编程的思考。在这篇文章中，我想分享一些我最喜欢的发现。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这不是那种</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">函数式编程将改变世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的博客文章：这篇文章的内容会更加深奥。我敢打赌大多数读者都没有听过下面的编程语言和范型，所以我希望你像我一样有很大的兴趣来学习这些新概念。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">注意：对于下面的大多数语言我拥有的经验很少：我只是发现它们背后的思想十分有魅力，但对于它们我没有任何专业知识，所以有任何更正和错误请指出。另外，如果你发现这里存在没有提到的任何新的范型和想法，欢迎把它们分享出来。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">更新：这篇文章上了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> r/programming </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> HN </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的首页。感谢反馈，我已经添加了一些修正。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

16.0pt">01<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">在大多数编程语言中，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">A
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">会先执行，然后执行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
B</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，最后执行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> C</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。但在像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">这样的语言中，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">A, B, </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> C </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">都将同时执行。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言中代码行之间的控制流或排序只是代码行之间显式依赖的副作用。例如，如果</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> B </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">具有对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> A </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">中定义的变量的引用，则</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> A </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> C </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">将同时执行，并且</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> B </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">将在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> A </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">完成之后执行。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">来看一下</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">中的一个例子。如教程中所述，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">ANI
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">程序由用于操作流和数据流的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">管道</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">锁存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">组成。这种非同一般的语法很难解析，而且这门语言似乎已经死了，不过这些概念还是非常有趣的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“Hello World”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">示例：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> “</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">锁存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">（锁存器有一点像变量），其中包含一个字符串；第二行将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> "Hello, World!" </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">发送到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> s</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，第三行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">解锁</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">” s </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">并将内容发送到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> std.out</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。因此，可以看到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的隐形程序排序：由于每一行的运行都取决于前一行，因此这里的代码将会按照编写的顺序执行。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Plaid </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言也声称默认情况下支持并发，但使用的是这篇论文中所描述的一种权限模型来构建控制流。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Plaid </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">还探索了其他有趣的概念，例如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Typestate-Oriented Programming</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">（面向类型状态编程），其中状态更改成为语言的重要因素：你定义的对象不再是作为类，而是可以由编译器检查的一系列状态和转换。看起来这十分有趣，正如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Rich Hickey </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Are we there yet </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">讲话中所讨论的将时间作为语言结构的首要因素。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Multicore </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">正处在上升期，并发性仍然比大多数语言更难。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Plaid </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">对于这个可能产生惊人的性能提升的问题提供了一个新的思路；不过问题是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">默认支持并行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">是否让并发更容易或难以管理。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">更新：上面的描述讲解了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
ANI </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
Plaid </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的基本本质，但我互换地使用了术语</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">并发</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">并行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，事实上它们具有不同的含义。有关更多信息，请参阅</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Concurrency Is Not Parallelism </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">（并发不是并行）这篇文章。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt">02<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><strong><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Times;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Times">依赖类型（</span></strong><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif">Dependent types</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Times;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Times">）</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">示例语言：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Idris, Agda, Coq<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">你可能已经习惯</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
C </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
Java </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">等语言的类型系统，编译器可以检查一个变量是整数、列表还是字符串。但如果你的编译器可以检查变量是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">正整数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">长度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 2  </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的列表</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，还是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">一个回文字符串</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，那又会怎么样呢？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这是支持依赖类型的语言背后的思想：你可以在编译时指定检查变量值的类型。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Scala </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> shapeless </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">库增加了对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Scala </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">依赖类型的部分实验支持（尚未正式支持），并提供了简单的方法来查看示例。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这里是如何声明一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Vector </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的代码，其中使用了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
shapeless </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">库，包含值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> 1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">2</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

3 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">上面的例子正常运行，因为类型系统知道两个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Vectors </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的长度都为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。然而，如果我们尝试</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> vAdd </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">两个长度不同的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Vectors</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，我们会在编译时得到一个错误，而不必等到运行时。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.5pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:
0cm;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E;mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="图片_x0020_9" o:spid="_x0000_i1044" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/dkwuWwLoRKibD9gLbH0ZMFiaegqdEaNqOmibtlGwoXS8yLjGT7Lic2JS9tBS49j4ExYMcSQzr1pzCjkJ3aojHK5yibw/640?wx_fmt=png&tp=webp&wxfrom=5&wx_lazy=1"
 style='width:490pt;height:125pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image009.png"
  o:title="//mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/dkwuWwLoRKibD9gLbH0ZMFiaegqdEaNqOmibtlGwoXS8yLjGT7Lic2JS9tBS49j4ExYMcSQzr1pzCjkJ3aojHK5yibw/640?wx_fmt=png&tp=webp&wxfrom=5&wx_lazy=1"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="490" height="125" src="quiver-image-url/5956B5737CAFB10582079BCDC88FC722.png" alt="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/dkwuWwLoRKibD9gLbH0ZMFiaegqdEaNqOmibtlGwoXS8yLjGT7Lic2JS9tBS49j4ExYMcSQzr1pzCjkJ3aojHK5yibw/640?wx_fmt=png&tp=webp&wxfrom=5&wx_lazy=1" v:shapes="图片_x0020_9"><!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Shapeless </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">是一个了不起的库，但就我所看到的，它仍然有点粗糙，只支持依赖类型的一个子集，并导致生成相当详细的代码和类型签名。另一方面，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Idris </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">使类型成为编程语言的首要成员，因此它的依赖类型系统看起来更强大和更干净。为了比较，请查看演讲</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> — Scala vs Idris: Dependent Types, Now and in the
Future </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">形式化验证方法已经存在很长一段时间了，但大多数情况下都十分麻烦，无法用于通用编程。依赖类型在像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Idris </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这样的语言中，甚至在未来的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Scala </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">中，可能会提供更轻量的和更实用的替代方案，这仍然能大大提高类型系统提供捕获错误的能力。当然，没有类型系统可以捕获所有的错误，由于终止（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">halting</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">）问题的固有局限性，但如果做得好，依赖类型可能是静态类型系统下一个大的飞跃。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt">03<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif">Concatenative </span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Times;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Times">语言</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">示例语言：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Forth, cat, joy<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">有没有想过在没有变量和函数应用的情况下编程是一种怎样的体验？没有？我也没试过。但显然有些人做了，他们提出了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> concatenative </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">编程这个概念。这个概念背后的思想是语言中的所有内容都是一个函数，用于将数据推送到堆栈或从堆栈弹出数据；程序几乎完全通过功能组合来构建（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">concatenation is composition</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">）。简单的说即是基于堆栈的编程语言。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这听起来很抽象，所以让我们来看一个简单的例子：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.5pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:
0cm;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3D464D">推到堆栈上：我们将它们放在括号中，以确保它们被压入未被评估的堆栈。这是因为它们将被用作</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3D464D">“then”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3D464D">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3D464D">分支（分别）用于调用下一行的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3D464D">分支。根据布尔条件的值，它会将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">示例语言：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Prolog, SQL<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">声明式编程已经存在了很多年，但大多数程序员仍不知道它是一个怎样的概念。简要来说：在大多数主流语言中，你是在描述如何解决特定的问题；在声明式语言中，你只需描述所需的结果，语言本身可推导出结果。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">例如，如果你在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
C </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言中从头开始编写排序算法，你会编写合并排序的说明，逐步描述如何递归地将数据集分为两部分并按顺序将其合并到一起：这里是一个例子。如果使用声明式语言如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Prolog </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">对数字进行排序，可以直接描述你需要的输出：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">我想要相同的值列表，但索引</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> i </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">中的每个项目应小于或等于索引</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> i
+ 1 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">中的项目</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。将上面</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> C </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言的解决方案和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Prolog </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">代码进行比较：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.5pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:
0cm;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">如果你使用过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> SQL</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，那么你已经使用了声明式编程，可能自己没有意识到这一点：当你发出一个像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> select X from Y where Z </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这样的查询，你就是在描述你想要返回的数据集；数据库引擎的工作实际上是如何执行查询。你可以在大多数数据库中使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> explain </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">命令来查看执行计划并弄清楚在引擎下发生了什么。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">声明式语言的优点在于它允许你在更高层次的抽象下工作：你的任务就是描述所需输出的规范。例如，在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Prolog </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">语言实现的一个简单数独解算器中只列出了一个数独谜题的答案的每行、列和对角线应该是怎样的：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.5pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;margin-left:
0cm;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">不幸的是，声明式编程语言的缺点是性能开销大。上面提到的排序算法时间复杂度可能是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> O(n!)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">；数独解算器使用暴力搜索；而且大多数开发人员不得不提供数据库提示和额外的索引，以避免执行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> SQL </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">查询时开销大且效率低的计划。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">示例语言：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Aurora<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Aurora </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">语言是符号式编程的一个例子：使用这些语言编写的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">代码</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">不仅可以包含纯文本，还可以包括图像、数学方程、图和图表等。你可以以该数据的原生格式来操作和描述各种大量的数据，而不是全部以文本形式描述。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Aurora </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">也是完全可交互的，它会立即显示每行代码的结果，像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> steroids </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> REPL</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Aurora </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Chris Granger </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">创建，它还构建了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Light Table IDE</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Chris </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">在它的文章</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Toward a
better programming</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">（为了更好地编程）中概述了创建</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Aurora </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的动机：一些目标是使编程更直观、直接和减少偶然的复杂性。要了解更多的信息，观看</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Bret Victor </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">的演讲：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Inventing on Principle, Media
for Thinking the Unthinkable, </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Learnable Programming</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

<p align="center" style="margin-top:7.5pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.5pt;
margin-left:0cm;text-align:center;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">示例：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Wolfram Language<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">很像上面提到的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
Aurora </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Wolfram </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言也是基于符号的编程。然而，符号层仅仅是为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Wolfram </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言的核心提供一致的接口，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Wolfram </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言是基于知识的编程语言：内置了大量的库、算法和数据。这使得可以轻松地从图形化的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Facebook </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">连接，到操纵图像、查找天气、处理自然语言查询、绘制地图上的方向、求解数学方式等方面做好一切。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">我猜想</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> Wolfram </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">语言有最大的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">标准库</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和任何现有语言的数据集。对于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
Internet connectivity </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">是编写代码的固有功能，我也感到十分兴奋：它几乎像一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
IDE</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，其中的自动完成功能进行谷歌搜索。看符号式编程模型是否像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> Wolfram </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">所说的那样灵活并真正利用所有这些数据，这将是非常有趣的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
